00040 //
00041 // A smart ToolBar class that has a "MainPanel" which is always
00042 // displayed, and an "ExtraPanel" that can be hidden to save space.
00043 // Can be docked into a ToolBarArea or floated in an ToolBarFrame;
00044 //
00045 
00046 class ExpandingToolBar : public wxPanel
00047 {
00048  public:
00049    DECLARE_DYNAMIC_CLASS(ExpandingToolBar)
00050 
00051    ExpandingToolBar(wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id,
00052                     const wxPoint& pos = wxDefaultPosition,
00053                     const wxSize& size = wxDefaultSize);
00054 
00055    virtual ~ExpandingToolBar();
00056 
00057    wxPanel *GetMainPanel() { return mMainPanel; }
00058    wxPanel *GetExtraPanel() { return mExtraPanel; }
00059 
00060    void SetAutoExpand(bool enabled) { mAutoExpand = enabled; }
00061    bool GetAutoExpand() { return mAutoExpand; }
00062 
00063    void Expand();
00064    void Collapse(bool now = false);
00065 
00066    bool IsExpanded() { return mIsExpanded; }
00067 
00068    void OnSize(wxSizeEvent &evt);
00069    void OnToggle(wxCommandEvent &evt);
00070    void OnTimer(wxTimerEvent &evt);
00071 
00072    void StartMoving();
00073    void UpdateMoving();
00074    void FinishMoving();
00075 
00076    virtual bool Layout();
00077    virtual void Fit();
00078 
00079  protected:
00080    void RecursivelyPushEventHandlers(wxWindow *win);
00081    bool IsCursorInWindow();
00082    void ReparentExtraPanel();
00083    void MoveDrawer(wxSize prevSize);
00084    wxBitmap GetToolbarBitmap();
00085    
00086    void TryAutoExpand();
00087    void TryAutoCollapse();
00088 
00089    wxPanel *mMainPanel;
00090    wxPanel *mExtraPanel;
00091    ToolBarGrabber *mGrabber;
00092    AButton *mToggleButton;
00093    bool mIsAutoExpanded;
00094    bool mIsManualExpanded;
00095    bool mIsExpanded;
00096    bool mAutoExpand;
00097    bool mFirstTime;
00098    wxSize mMainSize;
00099    wxSize mExtraSize;
00100    wxSize mButtonSize;
00101    wxSize mGrabberSize;
00102    wxSize mCurrentDrawerSize;
00103    wxSize mTargetDrawerSize;
00104    wxSize mCurrentTotalSize;
00105    WindowHash mWindowHash;
00106    wxTimer mTimer;
00107    ToolBarFrame *mFrameParent;
00108    ToolBarDialog *mDialogParent;
00109    ToolBarArea *mAreaParent;
00110    ToolBarArrangement *mSavedArrangement;
00111    ImageRollPanel *mTargetPanel;
00112    wxDragImage *mDragImage;
00113    wxWindow *mTopLevelParent;
00114    wxArrayRect mDropTargets;
00115    wxRect mDropTarget;
00116 
00117    static int msNoAutoExpandStack;
00118 
00119    DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE();
00120 
00121    friend class ExpandingToolBarEvtHandler;
00122 };

00191 //
00192 // Note: with a ToolBarArea, the parent sets the width, but the
00193 // ToolBarArea sets the height dynamically based on the number of
00194 // toolbars it contains.
00195 //
00196 class ToolBarArea : public wxPanel
00197 {
00198  public:
00199    DECLARE_DYNAMIC_CLASS(ToolBarArea)
00200 
00201    ToolBarArea(wxWindow* parent,
00202                wxWindowID id,
00203                const wxPoint& pos = wxDefaultPosition,
00204                const wxSize& size = wxDefaultSize);
00205    ~ToolBarArea();
00206 
00207    virtual bool Layout();
00208    virtual void Fit();
00209 
00210    virtual void OnSize(wxSizeEvent &evt);
00211    virtual void OnMouse(wxMouseEvent &evt);
00212 
00213    void CollapseAll(bool now = false);
00214 
00215    // Does not add or delete the window, just relates to layout...
00216    void AddChild(ExpandingToolBar *child);
00217    void RemoveChild(ExpandingToolBar *child);
00218 
00219    ToolBarArrangement *SaveArrangement();
00220    void RestoreArrangement(ToolBarArrangement *arrangement);
00221 
00222    wxArrayRect GetDropTargets();
00223    void MoveChild(ExpandingToolBar *child, wxRect dropTarget);
00224 
00225    void SetCapturedChild(ExpandingToolBar *child);
00226 
00227  protected:
00228    void ContractRow(int rowIndex);
00229    bool ExpandRow(int rowIndex);
00230    void LayoutOne(int childIndex);
00231    void AdjustLayout();
00232    void Fit(bool horizontal, bool vertical);
00233 
00234    ExpandingToolBarArray    mChildArray;
00235    wxArrayInt               mRowArray;
00236    wxSize                   mLastLayoutSize;
00237    bool                     mInOnSize;
00238 
00239    ExpandingToolBar        *mCapturedChild;
00240 
00241    wxSize                   mMinSize;
00242    wxSize                   mMaxSize;
00243    wxSize                   mActualSize;
00244 
00245    wxArrayRect              mDropTargets;

00247    wxArrayInt               mDropTargetRows;
00248 
00249    DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE()
00250 };
